name: Swellow
description: It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.effect: Attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
